remarks.para: Frees unmanaged resources used by the object. The object becomes unusable after that.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.Common.CImage.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.param: Indicates if disposing was initiated manually.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.Common.Util.Clone(System.Drawing.Bitmap)
member.returns: Return clone of the source image.
member.remarks: The original Bitmap.Clone() does not produce the desired result - it does not create an actual clone (it does not create a copy of the image). That is why this method was implemented to provide the functionality.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.Common.Util.Clone(System.Drawing.Imaging.BitmapData)
member.returns: Clones image from source image data. The message does not clone pallete in the case if the source image has indexed pixel format.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.Common.Util.CopyUnmanagedMemory(System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.returns: Return's value of - pointer to destination.

remarks.para: This function is required because of the fact that .NET does not provide any way to copy unmanaged blocks, but provides only methods to copy from unmanaged memory to managed memory and vise versa.

member.name: T:Dynamsoft.UVC.Camera
member.summary: Defines a class providing functions for controlling the camera.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.UVC.Camera.Open
member.summary: Loads the specified Source into main memory and starts its initialization. If no source is specified (no source selection function is called), it will open the default source.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check CameraException.
member.remarks: If no source selection function is called before Open(), Open() will open the default source.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.UVC.Camera.Close
member.summary: Closes Data Source (a DirectShow device like a webcam).
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check CameraException.
member.remarks: Close() will be called automatically when exiting the application, since the dll has a built-in Wizard Mode.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.UVC.Camera.DisplayPropertyPage
member.summary: Displays the property page of the webcam..
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check CameraException.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.UVC.Camera.FocusOnArea(System.Drawing.Rectangle)
member.summary: Focus on a specified Area,make the Area clearer.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check CameraException.
member.remarks: Please make sure the webcam supports focus.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.UVC.Camera.SetVideoContainer(System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Set the position of camera video display.
member.param: specifies the handle of the video window.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check CameraException.
member.remarks: Please do NOT set any webcam capability before calling this method, such as ResolutionForCam, Saturation, Hue, etc.

member.name: M:Dynamsoft.UVC.Camera.ResizeVideoWindow(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Resizes the video window to adapt its container.
member.param: specifies the value(in pixel) of the left edge of the video window.
specifies the value(in pixel) of the top edge of the video window.
specifies the value(in pixel) of the width of the video window.
specifies the value(in pixel) of the height of the video window.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check CameraException.
member.remarks: Please use this method after calling source selection related methods.

members.member:
Rotates the video which is displayed by 90,180 or 270 degrees.
specifies the rotate angle on a video capture device.
When an error occurs, please check CameraException.
The video displayed in the window is not rotated,you can use the OnFrameCapture event to get the rotated video frame. >

member.summary: Performas application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resources.
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check CameraException.

member.summary: Returns name of the current source(camera).
member.exception: When an error occurs, please check CameraException.

member.name: T:Dynamsoft.UVC.CameraProperty
member.summary: Defines a class providing functions for controlling properties of camera.

member.name: P:Dynamsoft.UVC.CameraProperty.MaxValue
member.summary: Returns the maximum value of a webcam property. This is a readonly property.

member.name: P:Dynamsoft.UVC.CameraProperty.MinValue
member.summary: Returns the minimum value of a webcam property. This is a readonly property.

member.name: P:Dynamsoft.UVC.CameraProperty.DefaultValue
member.summary: Returns the default value of a webcam property. This is a readonly property.

member.name: P:Dynamsoft.UVC.CameraProperty.Value
member.summary: Returns or sets the current value of a webcam property.

member.name: P:Dynamsoft.UVC.CameraProperty.IfAuto
member.summary: Returns if the value of a webcam property is automatically set. This is a readonly property.

member.name: P:Dynamsoft.UVC.CameraProperty.SteppingDelta
member.summary: Returns the stepping delta value of a webcam property. This is a readonly property.
